alert.note: Alert for Gunnison Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 26 at 4:30AM MDT until May 27 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 10 PM MDT FRIDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND DRY FUELS FOR COLORADO FIRE WEATHER ZONES 203 BELOW 6000 FEET, 207, 290, 291, 292, 293 BELOW 9500 FEET, 294, 295, AS WELL AS UTAH FIRE WEATHER ZONE 490... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND DRY FUELS FOR COLORADO FIRE WEATHER ZONES 203 BELOW 6000 FEET, 207, 290, 291, 292, 293 BELOW 9500 FEET, 294, 295, AS WELL AS UTAH FIRE WEATHER ZONE 490... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 10 PM MDT FRIDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 293 BELOW 9500 FEET... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 293 BELOW 9500 FEET... The National Weather Service in Grand Junction has issued a Red Flag Warning below 9500 feet for gusty winds, low relative humidity and dry fuels, which is in effect from 11 AM to 10 PM MDT Friday. A Fire Weather Watch also remains in effect for Saturday. * AFFECTED AREA...In Colorado, Fire Weather Zone 293 Gunnison Basin Forecast Area below 9500 feet. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph Friday with gusts up to 50 mph on Saturday. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...12 to 17 percent. * IMPACTS...Conditions will become favorable for easy ignition and rapid spread of fires due to low relative humidity and strong gusty winds.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
